channel.title: United States on Ginlistic
channel.description: Recent content in United States on Ginlistic

item.title: Aviation American Gin
item.description: About the Aviation American Gin Aviation American Gin is a brand of gin produced in Portland, Oregon, United States. It was first launched in 2006 and has since gained popularity, winning several awards and gaining a celebrity following, including actor Ryan Reynolds who became an owner and spokesperson for the brand in 2018. The gin is made with a unique blend of botanicals, including juniper, cardamom, lavender, coriander, and anise. It is distilled in a traditional copper pot still and bottled at 42% ABV.

item.title: Bluecoat American Dry Gin
item.description: Bluecoat American Dry Gin is a premium gin that is produced by the Philadelphia Distilling Company. It is an American-style gin that features a unique blend of botanicals, including juniper, citrus, coriander, and angelica root. The gin is made using a copper pot still, which is believed to enhance the quality and character of the gin. Bluecoat American Dry Gin is a smooth and complex gin that is known for its bold, crisp flavor.
